name: Dragon Party
description:
Dragon Party is an action-adventure platformer where you play as Prince Charming, a knight who ventures out to save Princess Beauty from the terrible fire dragon, Ahi Weliweli. Prince Charming must battle against a cavalcade of evil spiders, goblins, and dragonoids. Team up against the evil creatures of Erdonia with a party of interesting characters to defeat the mighty dragon.

This is just a demo I made in 2 weeks for a summer program. I plan on adding more levels eventually, but for now, I'm putting it up here for others to play.
